dublin_core.dcvalue: The use of pre recorded heart murmur in an electronic referral for a remote consultation can save children and their parents from having to travel to the nearest out patient clinic The heart sound can be recorded by the GP at the local health clinic and sent by e mail to the specialist 41 clinics in the North Norway healt region have invested in equipment that makes pre recorded sound referrals possible This study analyses whether this investment is a cost saving technology or not
Tidsskrift for den Norske lægeforening : tidsskrift for praktisk medicin, ny række
[Is transmission of heart murmurs via e-mail cost saving?].
